title: Add photo gallery and 'forever yours with love bablet' message

requirements.text: Add a photo gallery section to the apology page that displays the 8 uploaded user photos (Snapchat-1302406921.jpg, Snapchat-818160405.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-3.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-3.jpg) in an elegant layout that complements the existing emotional theme
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 uploaded photos are displayed in the photo gallery
Photos are stored in frontend/public/assets and referenced correctly
Gallery layout is responsive and visually harmonious with the existing apology page design
Photos maintain their aspect ratios and are displayed clearly

requirements.text: Display the message 'forever yours with love bablet' prominently on the apology page in a position that feels intimate and personal, using typography that matches the emotional tone of the existing content

quotes: write there down forever yours with love bablet

acceptanceCriteria: The exact text 'forever yours with love bablet' appears on the page
Message uses elegant typography consistent with the Playfair Display or similar serif font already in use
Text placement feels natural within the existing layout and emotional flow of the page
Message is clearly visible and readable

constraints: Do not modify the existing emotional theme colors or typography already established
Preserve the existing apology message and background image
User photos must be placed in frontend/public/assets, not routed through the backend
nonGoals: Do not add photo upload functionality
Do not add interactive features like photo zoom or slideshow animations unless they enhance the emotional experience
